greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = Sum_{d|n} phi(d)^n.
formula: If p is prime, a(p) = 1 + (p-1)^p = A110567(p-1).
a(n) = Sum_{k=1..n} phi(gcd(n,k))^n/phi(n/gcd(n,k)). - _Richard L. Ollerton_, May 07 2021
mathematica: a[n_] := DivisorSum[n, EulerPhi[#]^n &]; Array[a, 20] (* _Amiram Eldar_, Mar 13 2021 *)
results.author: _Seiichi Manyama_, Mar 13 2021
